{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Airlink101 |model=AR680W |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B0017GLCQM |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/25/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-N15 |manuf_rev= |availability=Discontinued |type=wireless router |fcc_id=RRK-AR680W,RRK2007050009 |ic_id=4833A-AR680W |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9 |cpu1_brand=5V Technologies |cpu1_model=5VT1310;RT1310A, GT8026.1, 0717B, 5VT1310; |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29AL032D90TFI04 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V641620ETP-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP1,, (38400,8,N,1),, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860;RT2860RT, GT43390D0, 0716ST; |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306S;RTL8306S, 6A434QA, G736B TAIWAN; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.17.6; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:18:02,00:1D:6A |oui_eth=00:18:02,00:1D:6A }} {{TagLine|300N Wireless Router}} :[http://www.airlink101.com/products/ar680w.php Product page]
The CPU in the FCC photos appears to be the ''[[5V Technologies]]'' 5VT1310.. :of which the ''[[Ralink]]'' RT1310A is a rebranded version of the chip.
*Per [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=82023 this DD-WRT forums thread], the [[Conceptronic C300BRS4 v1]] :is a clone ( / shares the same parent OEM model) of this device.
===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:airlink101:ar680w ''Airlink101 AR680W'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :U-Boot 1.1.3 bootloader, Linux 2.6.17.6
===PSU(s)=== The power adapter included with the device is a :'''Jentec Technology Co., Ltd.''' AF1805-A (5V, 3A). {{hasPowerSupply |brand=JENTEC |model=AF1805-A |manuf_country=China |input_v=100-120 |input_a= |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=3 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5.5 |output_ID=2.1 |output_LEN=9.5 |style=small, straight }}
